price: Andolsun ki biz İsrailoğullarını o aşağılayıcı azaptan kurtardık.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ نَجَّيۡنَا بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ مِنَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ ٱلۡمُهِينِ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: walaqad najjaynā banī is'rāīla mina al-ʿadhābi al-muhīni
